From: ' 
To:' 
(USANYS)" czl 
(USANYS)"  
Subject: RE: Epstein/Maxwell 
Date: Wed, 22 Jul 2020 17:36:26 +0000 
Yes, thanks 
From: (USANYS) < 
Sent: Wednesday, July 22, 2020 1:34 PM 
To: (USANYS) 
Subject: FW: Epstein/Maxwell 
12 tomorrow works for you, right? If so, I can propose that or something Friday morning in the alternative? 
From: (ODAG) 
Sent: Wednesday, July 22, 2020 1:03 PM 
To: (ODAG) 
Cc: (USANYS) 
Subject: RE: Epstein/Maxwell 
Hi MI, 
I'm happy to assist you. I'm available Thursday or Friday to discuss what documents you are trying to 
locate. Please let me know if you have availability on either of those days. 
(USANYS) 
Thanks, 
From: (ODAG) 
Sent: Wednesday, July 22, 2020 12:49 PM 
To: (USANYS) 
Cc: (USANYS) 
Subject: RE: Epstein/Maxwell 
. (ODAG) < 
Thanks. OPR and may have a better sense on document custodians than do I. 
From: (USANYS) < 
Sent: Wednesday, July 22, 2020 12:41 PM 
To: (ODAG) 
Cc: (USANYS) 
Subject: RE: Epstein/Maxwell 
(ODAG) < 
Thanks, M. Among our questions was who, whether at ODAG, SDFL, or NDGA we should be in touch with at this point 
regarding documents. I also know OPR did a significant document collection last year. 
We will reach back to OPR, but if there is a particular point of contact at SDFL or NDGA on issues related to document 
collection, in particular, please let us know. And if a call on those issues would be helpful, happy to set one up. 
EFTA00019238

Thanks very much, 
From: (ODAG) 
Sent: Wednesday, July 22, 2020 10:56 AM 
To: (USANYS) 
Cc: (USANYS) 
• (ODAG) 
Subject: RE: Epstein/Maxwell 
<M> 
Happy to talk, but my only real role related to recusal issues and consequences. Now that the CVRA litigation is over, you 
probably are best going directly to SDFL, as I don't have any of their documents. Thanks, =. 
Associate Deputy Attorney General 
Office: 
Cell: 
From: (USANYS) c 
Sent: Tuesday, July 21, 2020 6:23 PM 
To: 
(ODAG) 
Cc: (USANYS) 
Subject: Epstein/Maxwell 
=— Hope all is well. We had spoken last summer, after the Epstein case was charged, about some potential 
document/discovery requests related to the SDFL investigation and the NPA, in particular. Those conversations were 
largely at mooted at the time by Epstein's death, but as I'm sure you know, we've recently charged Ghislaine Maxwell and, 
anticipating potentially similar issues, we were hoping to revisit those conversations. Do you have time later this week 
for a  quick call? If so, please let us know what might work for you. 
Thanks very much, 
Chief, Public Corruption Unit 
U.S. Attorney's Office for the 
Southern District of New York 
Tel. 
EFTA00019239
